quotes.quote: If IÂ replaceÂ the word God with the word nature, I am far more at ease with the whole religious enterprise.
I've been totally replaced by people who are superior. I was doing, like, 15 different things. It's very gratifying to watch your job done better.
I canÂ replaceÂ things, but I could neverÂ replaceÂ my wife and kids.
Nothing canÂ replaceÂ your time and your strength.
We will not try toÂ replaceÂ our founding principles, we will reapply our founding principles.
We have toÂ replaceÂ beauty, which is a cultural concept, with goodness, which is a humanist concept.
We can neverÂ replaceÂ a friend. When a man is fortunate enough to have several, he finds they are all different. No one has a double in friendship.
There's nothing that can replace the feeling of winning.
ReplaceÂ your pursuit of success with the pursuit of contribution.
You can'tÂ replaceÂ a tree anyway. Like people, you don't know how big they were till they're gone.
We'veÂ replacedÂ the proclamation of Christ with an easy-listening legalism of do more and try harder.
Nothing couldÂ replaceÂ the feeling of total devotion from another person.
ReplaceÂ your self-defeating thoughts with self-supporting thoughts.
If you replace the word God in the Bible with the word Truth, it reads exactly right.
ReplaceÂ worry with prayer. Make the decision to pray whenever you catch yourself worrying.
ReplaceÂ the words "have to" with "get to" and watch how the cold rain on your life changes to sunshine.
ReplaceÂ your judgments with empathy, upgrade your complaining to gratitude and trade in your fear for love.
We want to believe we couldn't be replaced, and that the people we love are irreplaceable.
It is easy toÂ replaceÂ man, and it will take no great time, when Nature has lapsed, toÂ replaceÂ Nature.
Nothing canÂ replaceÂ courage, a resounding motivation and that little bit of luck.
ReplaceÂ fear-based thinking with love-based thinking.
If weÂ replacedÂ all of our guns with chicken sandwiches it would end all war immediately.

We have toÂ replaceÂ our focus on personalities with a focus on ideas so that the opinionated and self-serving pronouncements and forms of cyber-bullying are replaced by thoughtful dialogue and open-minded conversation.
If you don't want to be replaced by a machine, don't try to act like one!
Replace judgment with curiosity.
When weÂ replaceÂ a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.
ReplaceÂ those thoughts of worry with thoughts of hope, faith, and victory.
We'veÂ replacedÂ nearly all our emotions with fear
Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
Nothing canÂ replaceÂ confidence and single-minded pursuit of purpose.
